argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_llytop | |- ( j e. Locally Top -> j e. Top ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ssriv | |- Locally Top C_ Top |
| 3 |  | #P_resttop | |- ( ( j e. Top /\ x e. j ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. Top ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T. /\ ( j e. Top /\ x e. j ) ) -> ( j |`t x ) e. Top ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ssid | |- Top C_ Top |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( T. -> Top C_ Top ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_restlly | |- ( T. -> Top C_ Locally Top ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_trud | |- Top C_ Locally Top |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_eqssi | |- Locally Top = Top |
